clean_data: Senior Software Developer Senior span lSoftwarespan span lDeveloperspan Senior Software Developer Capital One Vienna VA An exceptionally driven resultoriented professional with over six years of experience in software development in various functional domains Healthcare Financial Ecommerce and Educational Industries using Java J2EE technologies Microservices Apache Spark Apache Kafka Angular v2 and Typescript Adept in endtoend development of software products from Requirement Analysis to System Study Designing Coding Testing TDD Documentation and Implementation SDLC utilizing proven functional and technical skills Strong problem solving and technical skillset coupled with confidence in decision making enabling effective solutions and leading to high customer satisfaction Work Experience Senior Software Developer Capital One McLean VA October 2018 to Present Description CapitalOne Financial Corporation is a bank holding company specializing in credit cards auto loans banking and savings accounts Responsibilities Worked at a senior level within the Customer Resiliency department of CapitalOne Card Services on platform Contact Strategy Management CSM Led the development effort to reduce and rewrite a core service using clustered computing reducing service runtime from 15 hours to 90 minutes Developed applications using Java Spark and SparkSQLStreaming for fast and efficient Big Data transformation and processing Worked extensively with Spark Core Spark Streaming and Spark SQL modules Developed UDFs in Java Spark for complex transformations and streamlined data processing Deployed applications within an AWS EMR cluster ensuring proficient stress testing and performance tuning of the application workers and memory Routinely deployed application enhancements and directly managed Production releases Integrated a Spring Boot microservice to produce and stream Kafka messages within the core Spark application Built real time data pipelines by developing Spark streaming applications for Kafka producers and Kafka consuming Modernized various communication channels for contacting delinquent customers through Phone Dialing manual auto Letter Email and SMS using Spring Boot and microservices principles Developed RESTful APIs using the Feign Framework Created measured statistics and analytics using a Splunk Dashboard to monitor realtime data flow Integrated with PagerDuty to ensure adequate incident response Technologies Java 8 Microservices Spring Boot PostgreSQL Apache Kafka Apache Spark RESTful Web Services OAuth AWS EMR AWS S3 AWS Lambda AWS RDS Feign Framework Splunk Full Stack Developer Inno 360 Inc East Brunswick NJ November 2017 to September 2018 Description Inno360 is a technology company offering innovation and product development teams of the worlds most innovative companies an awardwinning SaaS platform that utilizes powerful cognitive analytics powered by IBM Watson and intuitive visualizations to investigate rich content I worked with a team to build an application which enables a user to data mine vast amounts of content using a variety of visualization tools eliminating the need to look at every document Responsibilities Developed RESTful APIs using Spring Boot to serve the UI with required JSON data output to UI and data is subscribed by the Angular HTTP requests Developed Controllers Services DAO layers to interact with data layer and developed Entity classes based on the table structure Implemented Single Page Application with loading multiple views using route services and adding more user experience to make it more dynamic by using Angular 2 Implemented data Visualizations using High chats High Maps and D3js Used Selectors Events and Dom Manipulation using components in Angular 2 for updating content on DOM nodes Used ngrx in the angular to get the data from rest api and to manipulate them Used Swagger Framework to implement REST API Used GitHub to maintain the versions of the source code of the project Provided Clarification to a functional requirement to the team for any defect raised Technologies Angular 24 TypeScript SASS Java Spring MVC High charts D3JS REST API REST services Jasmine Karma Visual Studio Code Spring Tool Suite Apache Solr Angular UI Developer Orbit Health Care East Brunswick NJ August 2016 to October 2017 Description Orbit Healthcare is software developing which provides advanced technology software solutions in the healthcare domain Here I work with the team to develop the application that improve information flow between Patients Healthcare Providers Insurance Providers and Billing Providers to address the critical needs and reduce complexities Responsibilities Developed the ModelView using Angular 24 Responsible for Creation of TypeScript reusable components and services to consume REST APIs using Component based architecture provided by Angular 2 Developed the Rest controller and provide service to the controller to execute the Rest Services and providing JSON data to the Angular application Created tasks for updating tsconfig tracked based on tslinting and compiling Typescript files Involved in developing templates using HTML5 and CSS3 Involved in writing typescript for the components communication in the application Implemented RESTful web services using HTTP Client Implemented unit testing using Jasmine and Karma Provided Clarification to a functional requirement to the team for any defect raised Technologies Angular 2 TypeScript Node JS Firebase REST API REST services Jasmine Karma Visual Studio Code Systems Engineer Infosys Ltd Hyderabad Telangana September 2014 to December 2015 India Description Infosys Limited is an Indian multinational corporation that provides business consulting information technology and outsourcing services Here the client is Medtronic and the project is an ecommerce web application to market their devices across the world Responsibilities Understanding and analyzing the Client Requirements with existing flow and functionalities Involved in developing HTML and JavaScript for clientside presentation and data validations within the forms Involved construction of JSPs referring to the prototype shared by Client using styles and css provided by them Developing the Java bean Classes and configure them in XML files Implemented the data access layer using Hibernate persistence framework through Hybris Suite Building Restful Web Services Using Spring Restful services Developed the enterprise application by integrating SpringHibernate Frameworks Used spring framework to implement the MVC design pattern for implementing the business logic of the application MySQL database has been used in the storage section Having responsibilities to create lots of SQL queries stored procedures and triggers Used SVN as a version controller Implemented Log4J to trace logs and to track information Followed test driven design TDD technique and worked on Pair programming Technologies JDK17 Spring Eclipse Apache Web server Tomcat MySQL Spring Hibernate Git Maven Log4J Junit Mockito Postman Hybris Web Developer Mayukh Soft solutions Hyderabad Telangana May 2014 to August 2014 India Description This application enables clients to access review and update Insurance coverages online The website functionality was extended by providing the customers to Login and perform online transactions like paying bills online and updating their insurance policy Responsibilities Built the Responsive UI screen for creating new customer process create bill to and ship to screens customer search results page and customer dashboard page using Bootstrap Creating dynamic web pages using HTMLHTML5 CSSCSS3 JavaScript Developed Java J2EE application using spring MVC and Hibernate using JDBC driver Used Dependency Injection DI or Inversion of Control IOC to develop code for obtaining bean references in spring framework using annotations Used ANT and Jenkins for Build process and continuous integration OnshoreOffshore coordination Helping the QA team in integration testing Fixing QA defect for the application Deployment of the application to the test and production environment Technologies HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript REST API JAXRS Hibernate Spring MVC Log4J ANT Java Spring 30 Hibernate Spring WS JAXRS Spring web services WebLogic Junit Eclipse JSP
